price: Esta es la promesa de Dios, y Dios no falta a Su promesa, pero la mayoría de la gente no lo sabe.
arabic: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿda al-lahi lā yukh'lifu al-lahu waʿdahu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
